gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.streams
Interface StreamsProvider

All Superinterfaces:
ResourceWrapper
All Known Implementing Classes:
PollingStreamsProviderImpl, StreamsProviderImpl
public interface StreamsProvider
extends ResourceWrapper

The StreamsProvider creates and provides streams using a string argument that can describe each stream. Even though there can be different implementations for this interface, the initial idea is for an object factory that creates streams and makes them available to the runtime independent business layer.

Method Detail

getInputStream

InputStream getInputStream(String fileDescriptor)
                           throws DataException
Creates an InputStream. This stream must be explicitly closed by the program that opened it.

Parameters:
fileDescriptor - string giving information to the provider in order to create the stream. Can be the filename or any other information.
Returns:
returns an inputStream.
Throws:
DataException

getManagedInputStream

InputStream getManagedInputStream(String fileDescriptor)
                                  throws DataException
Creates an InputStream. This stream is managed, and will be closed by this Provider automatically.

Parameters:
fileDescriptor - string giving information to the provider in order to create the stream. Can be the filename or any other information.

returns an inputStream.
